sentences.sContent: In most heteromorphic plants the stigmas of the different morphs have different surface textures and the pollen may be of different size or sculpturing or both.
sentences.sContent_eng: In most heteromorphic plants the stigmas of the different morphs have different surface textures and the pollen may be of different size or sculpturing or both.
sentences.sCn: 在大多数异态型植物中．不同形态的柱头的表面结构不同，花粉的大小或纹饰不同，或两者兼而有之。

synos.tran: [生物]异形的，异态的；[化学]多晶型的

trans.tranCn: [生物] 异形的，[生物] 异态的；[化学] 多晶型的
trans.tranOther: differing from the normal form in size, shape, and function
